abstract: Yahoo will announce a big round of layoffs early Wednesday morning. The layoffs are part of a broader reorganization effort under Scott Thompson, the company's new chief executive. According to sources, Yahoo's product division will sustain the heaviest losses, while its media business is expected to stay relatively intact.

headline.main: Wednesday Is Layoff Day at Yahoo
